ListAllProjects.description: If true, each project in the solution is added to the dropdown list

additionalProperties.description: Property name is the name of a multi-project configuration which will be added to the dropdown list

Projects.description: Dictionary of projects to be started

additionalProperties.description: Property name is the name of a project

StartExternalProgram.description: Optional path to external program to run when debugging

SolutionConfiguration.description: Optional name of solution configuration (e.g. 'Debug' or 'Release') to be activated

SolutionPlatform.description: Optional name of solution platform (e.g. 'Any CPU' or 'x64') to be activated
